    level="1"

>
[Morrigna's Spider Affinity](/Feats.aspx?ID=2362) <actions string="" />
</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Duskwalker" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=257" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Ancestry Guide](/Sources.aspx?ID=74) pg. 31 <sup>2.0</sup></row>

</column>

---

Much like [morrignas](/Monsters.aspx?ID=340), you feel an affinity for spiders. You can cast [_animal messenger_](/Spells.aspx?ID=11) (spiders only), [_speak with animals_](/Spells.aspx?ID=293) (spiders only), and [_spider climb_](/Spells.aspx?ID=299) each once per day as 2nd-level divine innate spells.
name: Morrigna's Spider Affinity
